name: Rogue Weather Drone
description: "A VAND-CO weather-control drone has gone haywire! It's creating a micro-blizzard... in July. At the beach. Someone needs to fly up and disable it."
requirements: ASSIST civilians trapped in the 'flash freeze'

name: Stolen Art Escort
description: "We've recovered the stolen 'Starry Night'. It's being transported from the police depot back to the museum. We... expect trouble."

name: Parrot on the Loose
description: "My parrot, 'Captain Claws,' learned how to pick the lock on his cage and is now on top of the library. He... knows some of my... secrets. Please get him before he talks."
requirements: CLIMB the library to reach the parrot
COAX the parrot back into its carrier

name: Hero-Themed Restaurant
description: "The 'Gigaburger' is opening a new 'SDN-themed' burger joint. They need a real hero to be the first customer and try the 'Flambae Burger'!"
requirements: EAT the... 'heroic' meal for the cameras

name: Freegoes vs. Redline
description: "The 'Freegoes' and 'Redline' gangs are having a full-on brawl... with construction equipment... at the new VAND-CO tower site. Shut it down."

name: Red Ring Data Hub
description: "We've located a Red Ring server hub in an abandoned subway. They're coordinating their city-wide ops. We need you to get in, wipe their data, and get out."
requirements: HACK and wipe the central server

name: Escaped... "Pet"
description: "A... 'specimen'... has escaped its VANDLABS containment. It's... small, fast, and invisible. We need someone to track it before it breeds. Or something."
requirements: CONTAIN the specimen without harming it

name: Yacht Club Sabotage
description: "Someone is remotely steering luxury yachts out of the marina and crashing them into the breakwater! Stop them before they destroy the whole fleet!"
requirements: BOARD the vessels and override the controls
IDENTIFY the source of the remote signal

name: Cat Show Judging
description: "The annual Torrance Cat Fanciers' show needs a celebrity judge! We thought... who's more celebrity than a hero? Just... be nice to the cats."

name: Stuck Moving Truck
description: "My moving truck is stuck in the college underpass. It's... 'wedged'. Can you... 'un-wedge' it? Like, right now?"
requirements: PUSH the truck clear of the underpass

name: VAND-CO Tower Takeover
description: "It's the Red Ring! They've sealed the VAND-CO tower, 50th floor and up. Mr. Vanderstenk is trapped. This is not a drill."
requirements: FIGHT through Red Ring elite guards

name: Grave Robbery
description: "This is... weird. Someone dug up the grave of Torrance's founder. Nothing was *taken*. They just... dug. Can you investigate?"
requirements: ANALYZE clues left by the perpetrators

name: Fire at the Library
description: "The old library is on fire! We think it's arson. There are still people trapped in the rare books section! We can't get to them!"
requirements: PROTECT the firefighters from falling debris

name: Rooftop Standoff
description: "We've cornered a 'Redline' gang member on a rooftop. He's... got one of those VAND-CO rocket-packs. And he's a terrible pilot. He's a danger to everyone."

name: Runaway Shopping Cart
description: "A... 'super'... shopping cart is rolling down the hill towards the marina. I think... I think my stock boy is *inside* it."

name: Red Ring Recruitment
description: "We've seen Red Ring recruiters on campus, handing out flyers... for a 'study group'? We need someone to go undercover and find out what they're *really* planning."
requirements: GATHER intel on their campus operation

name: Kaiju vs. Refinery
description: "A 10-story... *thing*... just walked out of the ocean and is... eating... the refinery. I am not kidding. Get here. Now."
requirements: DISTRACT the Kaiju from the refinery
LEAD the creature back to the ocean

name: Mayoral Speech
description: "Mayor Yao is giving a speech on... something. Honestly, we just need a hero to stand behind him and look impressive for the cameras."

name: Ambulance Chase
description: "A patient just hijacked an ambulance! He's driving it... badly... through downtown. Stop him before he kills someone!"

name: VAND-CO Drone Crash
description: "A VAND-CO experimental drone just crashed somewhere near the port. We need you to find the wreckage and... *all* the parts... before anyone else does."
requirements: LOCATE the crash site in the port district

name: Red Ring Smuggling Op
description: "We've got Red Ring on a cargo ship at the port. They're not being subtle. They're unloading military-grade hardware. Stop them."

name: Lost Child at the Mall
description: "We have a lost child. He's... crying. Very, *very* loudly. Can you send someone... good with kids? Please? My ears..."

name: Hostage Situation at Gigaburger
description: "We've got a hostage situation at the Gigaburger. One gunman, ex-employee. He's... emotional. And he wants free burgers."

name: Museum Heist
description: "They're here! The Red Ring! They bypassed all security and are stealing the 'Gem of Torrance'! Stop them!"
requirements: INTERCEPT the thieves in the main hall

name: Downtown Sinkhole Cluster
description: "It's not *a* sinkhole, it's a *dozen*! The whole ground is unstable downtown. We need search and rescue for anyone who fell in."
requirements: SEARCH the sinkhole cluster for survivors
STABILIZE the ground for emergency crews

name: College Mascot Kidnapping
description: "The 'Torrance Turtles' mascot... the costume... has been stolen. Right before the big game. The... other team... is our prime suspect."
requirements: TRACK down the rival team's pranksters

name: Refinery Pipeline Breach
description: "A pipeline just burst! It's flooding the access tunnels with crude oil. We've got workers trapped!"
requirements: LOCATE and rescue the trapped workers

name: "The Bone Zone" Debate
description: "My guest for tonight's debate on 'Are Heroes a Menace?' just... 'disappeared'. I need someone from SDN to take the 'pro-menace' side. Kidding. Or am I?"
requirements: PARTICIPATE in the live radio debate

name: Illegal Street Race
description: "We have an illegal street race involving... VAND-CO 'hover-cars'? They're tearing up the highway. We can't catch them."
requirements: DISABLE the vehicles without causing a crash

name: VAND-CO "PR" Problem
description: "A... 'disgruntled'... ex-employee is in the VAND-CO lobby. With a... sledgehammer. He's... 'redecorating'. Remove him. Quietly."

name: Locked in a Bank Vault
description: "Hello? Yes, I'm... locked in the West Torrance Bank vault. The... time lock... engaged. I'm the janitor. Can you... get me out? It's cold."
requirements: PRY open the bank vault door

name: Red Ring Intel Courier
description: "A Red Ring courier is on a motorcycle, heading for the highway. He has their new op plans. We need those plans. Get him."
requirements: FORCE the motorcycle off the road

name: Sewer Lab
description: "We've been getting reports of... strange lights... and smells... from a sewer junction under the refinery. Smells like... chemicals. And... worse."

name: Rogue Art Installation
description: "The new 'Kinetic Chaos' exhibit has... gone rogue. A VAND-CO sculpture is... 'assaulting' patrons. With... art. Stop it."

name: Stuck Ferris Wheel
description: "The pier Ferris Wheel is stuck. At the top. And it's... windy. We need to get the people down before they panic."

name: Movie Set Mayhem
description: "The 'Mecha-Man' movie is filming. A... 'fan'... just stole a prop 'laser cannon' and is 'zapping' the crew. He thinks it's real."
requirements: ESCORT the fan off the set

name: VAND-CO Drone Swarm
description: "A shipment of our 'Bidet 2.0' delivery drones has been hijacked and armed! They're swarming the financial district! Stop them!"

name: Charity Auction
description: "It's the annual Mayor's charity auction. We need a hero to... 'volunteer' to be auctioned off. For a 'dinner with a hero'. It's for the kids."
requirements: BE charming to the high bidders

name: Red Ring Highway Chase
description: "A Red Ring convoy is on the I-5, heading out of the city! They're... *transporting* something. Something big. This is our last chance to stop them."
requirements: INTERCEPT the Red Ring convoy at high speed

name: Warehouse Fire
description: "Warehouse 9 at the port is on fire! We can't get inside, but we hear... something. Banging. We think someone's trapped."
requirements: FIND the source of the noise

name: "Helpful" Hero
description: "There's... a 'hero'... 'helping'... a broken-down car. By... 'punching' it. I think he's making it worse. Can you... stop him?"
requirements: MOVE the car off the road

name: VANDLABS Blackout
description: "The... the power... it's out. In... in the whole lab. The... *specimen bays*... are on battery backup. *Please* restore the power. Quickly."
requirements: ENSURE all containment systems are re-engaged

name: Red Ring Propaganda
description: "The Red Ring is... 'hosting'... a rally. At the college. They're handing out 'free stuff'. We need someone to go... 'debate' them. And shut it down."

name: ATM Robbery
description: "We've got a... 'super'... ATM robbery. Suspect just... pulled the ATM out of the wall. With his hands. He's walking away with it."

name: Escaped Zoo Animal
description: "Is... that... a... lion? There's a LION... at the mall. It... looks... confused. And hungry."
requirements: TRACK the lion through the mall
SECURE the area for Zoo transport

name: Rival Hero Brawl
description: "It's those two idiots again! 'Lightning-Lad' and 'Boulder-Boy' are wrecking my bar! Get them out!"
requirements: MINIMIZE collateral damage to the bar

name: Sinkhole Car Rescue
description: "A car! A car just fell into a sinkhole near the college! I can... I can hear them! They're trapped!"

name: Port Crane Collapse
description: "A VAND-CO cargo crane just collapsed! It's... a mess. It's blocking the main channel and... I think... the operator is still in the cab."
requirements: SEARCH the wreckage for the operator
LIFT the crane debris to clear the channel

name: "Aggressive" Protesters
description: "We have... 'protesters'... at City Hall. They're... 'aggressively'...'petitioning'. With... 'paintballs'. Can you... de-escalate this?"
requirements: CALM the crowd using non-violent means
